Plot: As Isabelle is about to leave on a camping trip, her roommates and a friend are ready to party. They want to celebrate her permanent residency in Quebec.
Title: Bonne Nuit Sexy Deer
Writer: Ariane Louis-Seize Plouffe (story), Ariane Louis-Seize Plouffe, Ariane Louis-Seize Plouffe
Actors: Adam Capriolo, Albane Chateau, Ansia Wilscam-Desjardins, Marie-Michèle Boutet
